ability_description.LINK_CABLE: Dash to the farthest reachable enemy Pokémon, then trigger an electric arc between $t(pkm.PLUSLE) and $t(pkm.MINUN), dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL. If $t(pkm.PLUSLE) or $t(pkm.MINUN) are alone, deal half this damage to ADJACENT enemy Pokémon instead.
ability_description.MAGIC_BOUNCE: For 5 seconds, whenever the user is hit by an ability, block the damage and reflect [50,100,SP]% SPECIAL to the caster.
ability_description.REFLECT: For 2 seconds, whenever the user received PHYSICAL, block the damage and reflect [50,SP]% of the damage as SPECIAL to the attacker.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_A: Summon 4 Abra, one at each corner of the battlefield.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_B: BURN all enemy Pokémon for 30 seconds.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_C: Give AMULET_COIN to all allied Pokémon. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_D: Add Ditto to the allied player's bench.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_E: Add a EGG_FOR_SELL to the allied player's bench. It hatches in the next stage.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_F: Fish 2 random WATER Pokémon at max fishing level.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_H: Heal all allied Pokémon to max HP.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_I: The allied player gets a random item component.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_K: Summon Hitmonlee with a RED_ORB and max PP.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_L: All enemy Pokémon are LOCKED for 5 seconds.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_M: All allied Pokémon are restored to max PP.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_N: All allied Pokémon gain [50,SP] SHIELD and cast $t(ability.EXPLOSION).
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_O: Cook a random dish for all your Pokémon next fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Q: Immediately end the fight with a draw.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_R: The allied player gets 6 free shop rerolls.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_S: A tidal wave cleans up negative status and field effects, heals 20% HP of all your team and knocks back and damages enemies for 10% of their HP as TRUE.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_T: The allied player gets 3 random berries.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_U: Summon Uxie with AQUA_EGG and max PP.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_W: The allied player gets a high rarity Pokémon matching their highest synergy.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_X: Gives XRAY_VISION to all allied Pokémon. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Y: All your team casts $t(ability.MEDITATE), which increase their attack by [100,SP]%.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Z: FREEZE all enemy Pokémon for 2 seconds.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_QM: The allied player gets 4 random Unown on their bench.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_EM: Summon 4 random Unown, one at each corner of the battlefield.
ability_description.POISON_JAB: Deal [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL, swap places with the target, and inflict both the target and the caster with POISONNED for 3 seconds.
ability_description.SHELL_SMASH: Deal [15,30,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemy Pokémon. Gain 2 ATK, 20 AP and 20 SPEED and lose 2 DEF and 2 SPE_DEF.
ability_description.HELPING_HAND: Grant [30,60,100,SP] SHIELD to the 2 nearest allied Pokémon and double the damage of their next ability.
ability_description.ASTRAL_BARRAGE: Send [7,SP] small ghosts toward random enemy Pokémon, each dealing 20 SPECIAL.
ability_description.WATERFALL: Gain [50,100,150,SP] SHIELD, cure any negative status conditions and clear the tile.
ability_description.PYRO_BALL: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and applying BURN for 2 seconds to all enemy Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.WHIRLPOOL: Unleash a hail of 4 whirlpools toward the farthest enemy Pokémon, each dealing [125,SP]% ATK SPECIAL to the first enemy Pokémon in their path.
ability_description.SMOKE_SCREEN: Channel underground and reappear in the middle of the enemy team, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and applying smoke to the back row, making enemies BLINDED.
ability_description.PRESENT: Either deal [80,SP], [150,SP] or [300,SP] SPECIAL to the target, or heal them for 50 HP, based on your LUCK.
ability_description.LEAF_BLADE: The user's next attack is a guaranteed critical hit dealing [100,SP]% of ATK as TRUE.
ability_description.ANCHOR_SHOT: Grab the farthest enemy Pokémon and deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.MAGNET_RISE: Grant PROTECT for 2 seconds and [10,SP]% dodge chance to the user and to the [2,4,6] ADJACENT allied Pokémon with the lowest health.
ability_description.ATTRACT: Inflict [1,2,3] random enemy Pokémon with CHARM for [1,SP] seconds.
ability_description.WATER_PULSE: Deal [75,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target and ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and inflict them with CONFUSION for 2 seconds.
ability_description.PLAY_ROUGH: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict it with CHARM for 2.5 seconds.
ability_description.PARABOLIC_CHARGE: Heal the user for [25,50] HP and deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Excess HP is converted into SPECIAL.
ability_description.SUPER_FANG: Deal [25,SP=0.5]% of target's max HP as TRUE.
ability_description.TEETER_DANCE: Gain [20,SP] SPEED. All Pokémon, allies and enemies alike, get CONFUSION for 3 seconds.
ability_description.CLOSE_COMBAT: Deal [130,SP] SPECIAL to the target and reduce the user's DEF and SPE_DEF by 2.
ability_description.AQUA_RING: Dive into the middle of the allied team, creating an aquatic ring that cures negative status conditions and heals for [20,30,50,SP] HP.
ability_description.POISON_GAS: A cloud of stinky gas is thrown in the face of all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting POISONNED for 3 seconds.
ability_description.ASSIST: Use the ability of a random allied Pokémon.
ability_description.FISSURE: Open [2,3,4] rifts. Each rift deals [25,50,75,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.ASSURANCE: Deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The damage is doubled if the user has less than 50% HP.
ability_description.BRAVE_BIRD: Fly away with the target dealing [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.MAGICAL_LEAF: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the farthest target, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting ARMOR_BREAK for 3 seconds to all enemy Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.STEALTH_ROCKS: Lay sharp stones within a [1,2,3] tile CONE, dealing [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to any enemy Pokémon in the area. The stones remain on the battlefield, dealing 10 PHYSICAL per second and WOUND non ROCK enemy Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.TAIL_GLOW: Deal [30,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and increase the user's AP by 50.
ability_description.STRUGGLE_BUG: Deal [30,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and reduce their AP by 50.
ability_description.PRISMATIC_LASER: The user shoots a 3-tile wide prismatic laser in a vertical straight line, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL and pushing any enemy in its path.
ability_description.NATURAL_GIFT: Heal the most damaged allied Pokémon for [30,60,120,SP] HP and grant them RUNE_PROTECT for [1,2,3] seconds.
ability_description.NIGHT_SHADE: Deal [25,33,50,SP=0.5]% of target's max HP as TRUE.
ability_description.CHARGE_BEAM: Fire a concentrated bundle of electricity that propagates to a maximum of 3 ADJACENT enemy Pokémon, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to each.
ability_description.POPULATION_BOMB: Deal 10 SPECIAL [4,8,12,16,SP] times to the target.
ability_description.SCREECH: Reduce DEF of all enemies in a 2-range radius by [2,4,8,SP].
ability_description.SAND_TOMB: Deal [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with SILENCE and PARALYSIS for [3,5,8] seconds.
ability_description.WHIRLWIND: Deal [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and make them fly away.
ability_description.ACID_SPRAY: Spit poison directly at an enemy Pokémon, dealing [33,SP] SPECIAL and reducing their SPE_DEF by 5. The ability then rebounds to another ADJACENT enemy (5 bounces max).
ability_description.UNBOUND: Unbinds itself to become Hoopa's true form and gains a humongous amount of power.
ability_description.HYPERSPACE_FURY: Using its many arms, unleashes a barrage of [4,SP] attacks. Each attack deals 15 SPECIAL to the target and lowers their DEF and SPE_DEF by 1.
ability_description.SNIPE_SHOT: Fire a shot of water from the user's index fingertips at the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [40,80,160,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.AIR_SLASH: Deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with FLINCH for 7 seconds.
ability_description.EGG_BOMB: Launch an explosive egg at the target, dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and inflicting them with ARMOR_BREAK for 4 seconds. For each enemy Pokémon KO'd, there is a [25,LK]% chance of an egg appearing on the allied player's bench.
ability_description.FLORAL_HEALING: Heal HP equal to max PP of Comfey's holder or Comfey itself if not held.
ability_description.VINE_WHIP: Deal [100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and cause them and all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon to PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.BODY_SLAM: Deal [30,SP]% of the user's max HP as SPECIAL to the target.
ability_description.STOCKPILE: The user inflates itself, gaining [50,SP] max HP and losing 10 SPEED. After 3 casts, spit up, dealing [50,SP] % of max HP as SPECIAL to the target and propelling the user to the backline while retrieving its base max HP and SPEED.
ability_description.BARB_BARRAGE: Dive into the middle of the enemy team, dealing [20,40,60,80,SP] SPECIAL to all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and inflict them with POISONNED for 3 seconds.
ability_description.MAGIC_POWDER: Gain [10,20,40,SP] SHIELD and SILENCE ADJACENT enemy Pokémon for [2,3,4] seconds.
ability_description.INFERNAL_PARADE: Shoot a returning Flame Wheel at farthest enemy, dealing [30, SP] SPECIAL twice to all enemy Pokémon in its path with a [50,LK]% chance to apply BURN for 3s.
ability_description.RETALIATE: Deal [150,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL to the target + 1 additional attack for each fallen allied Pokémon.
ability_description.SLASH: Deal [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to the target with a [30,60,90]% increased CRIT_CHANCE ratio. Can crit by default.
ability_description.OUTRAGE: Deal [150,200,250,SP]% ATK as SPECIAL to the target and ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and inflict the user with CONFUSION for 2 seconds.
ability_description.LUNGE: Jump to the enemy Pokémon with the highest ATK, dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL and reducing its ATK by [5,SP].
ability_description.KNOCK_OFF: Deal [90,SP] SPECIAL to the target, +[30,SP] SPECIAL for each item held by the target. All of the target's items are removed.
ability_description.FISHIOUS_REND: Deal [80,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The damage is doubled if the user has more SPEED than the target.
ability_description.CURSE: Inflict the highest HP enemy Pokémon with CURSE that will KO after [8,5,3,SP=-0.2] seconds.
ability_description.DOOM_DESIRE: After 2 seconds, deal [150,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Restore all PP if the target is KO'd in the duration.
ability_description.TIME_TRAVEL: Go back in time to retrieve lost health. Cure the negative status conditions of all allied Pokémon and heal them for [25,SP] HP.
ability_description.POLTERGEIST: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target, +[20,SP] SPECIAL for each item held by the target ([40,SP] for ARTIFICIAL items).
ability_description.GOLD_RUSH: Deal [20,SP] + the allied player's GOLD value as SPECIAL, then the allied player earns 2 GOLD.
ability_description.MAKE_IT_RAIN: Deal [100,SP] + the allied player's GOLD value as SPECIAL.
ability_description.CRUSH_GRIP: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the damage: between [50,SP] and [250,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.AURASPHERE: Exude an aura and project energy in a line, dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting all enemy Pokémon hit with SILENCE for 3 seconds.
ability_description.SKETCH: Copy the ability, max PP and STAR of the allied Pokémon on the user's left at the start of the fight.
ability_description.OVERDRIVE: Twang an electric guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration. Deal [120,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL within a 3 tile radius of the user, -20% damage per tile from the user.
ability_description.LOVELY_KISS: Kiss the enemy Pokémon with a frightening expression. Put the target to SLEEP for [2,4,6,SP] seconds. If the target is already suffering from SLEEP, deal [50,100,150,SP] SPECIAL instead.
ability_description.TRANSFORM: Take the appearance, stats (except HP) and ability of the target.
ability_description.PSYCHIC_FANGS: Deal [80,SP] SPECIAL and remove all the target's ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF stat increases.
ability_description.SHED_TAIL: Create a substitute and charge towards the ally with the lowest HP, granting them [80, SP] SHIELD.
ability_description.NIGHT_SLASH: Deal [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Can crit by default.
ability_description.KOWTOW_CLEAVE: Deal 150% ATK to the target, + [20,SP]% TRUE for each fallen allied Pokémon. Can crit by default
ability_description.SHIELDS_DOWN: Transform Minior to a random core form.
ability_description.SHIELDS_UP: Transform Minior to its meteor form.
ability_description.SANDSEAR_STORM: Searingly hot sand that strikes all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and applying BURN for 2 seconds.
ability_description.WILDBOLT_STORM: Thunderous tempest that strikes all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting PARALYSIS for 4 seconds.
ability_description.BLEAKWIND_STORM: Savagely cold winds that strike all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and applying FREEZE for 2 seconds.
ability_description.SPRINGTIDE_STORM: Fierce winds brimming with love and hate strike all enemy Pokémon in a straight line, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting CHARM for 2 seconds.
ability_description.AURA_WHEEL: Deal [60,SP] SPECIAL to the target, gain [10,SP] SPEED and switch between Normal and Hangry form.
ability_description.LICK: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with CONFUSION and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.FURY_SWIPES: Deal a random number of basic attacks between [2,SP] to [5,SP] times. This number increases with LUCK.
ability_description.TICKLE: Reduce ATK and DEF of the [1,2] closest enemy Pokémon by [3,SP].
ability_description.AROMATHERAPY: Cure negative status conditions and heal ADJACENT allied Pokémon for [20,40,80,SP] HP.
ability_description.DETECT: PROTECT ADJACENT allied Pokémon for [0.5,SP,ND=1] seconds, multiplied by the number of enemy Pokémon detected in a 2 tile radius.
ability_description.SPACIAL_REND: Reverse the position of the enemy team, then deal [100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the same row as the target.
ability_description.MULTI_ATTACK: Deal [15,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemy Pokémon, multiplied by the sum of levels of all $t(pkm.SILVALLY) additional synergies.
ability_description.STICKY_WEB: Deal [20,35,70,SP] SPECIAL to the target and project a web around them. Pokémon walking on the web are inflicted with PARALYSIS for 2 seconds.
ability_description.ACCELEROCK: Jump next to the farthest enemy and deal [100,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL to them. Reduce the user's DEF by 2 and increase their SPEED by 5 up to [5,SP] times.
ability_description.PETAL_BLIZZARD: Deal [30,SP] SPECIAL to all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and gain 10 AP.
ability_description.SUNSTEEL_STRIKE: Jump and land in the middle of the enemy team with the power of a meteor, Dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL to all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon.
ability_description.MOONGEIST_BEAM: Deal [100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in a line behind the target and inflict them with PARALYSIS for 3 seconds. Allied Pokémon in the beam gain [100,SP] SHIELD.
ability_description.FLEUR_CANNON: Launch a devastating laser beam, dealing [120,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the path and reduce the user's AP by 20.
ability_description.SPIRIT_BREAK: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and reduce their AP by [20,SP].
ability_description.SHEER_COLD: A blast of absolute-zero cold deals [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to the target with [10,20,30,LK]% chance to execute. The more HP the user has relative to the target, the greater the chance. Always execute enemy Pokémon suffering from FREEZE, but never execute ICE Pokémon.
ability_description.EXTREME_SPEED: Dash to the farthest enemy, dealing [40,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the path.
ability_description.ZAP_CANNON: Fire an electric blast like a cannon, dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflicting them with PARALYSIS and ARMOR_BREAK for [1,2,4] seconds.
ability_description.PSYCHO_BOOST: Slash the target and any enemy Pokémon ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW, dealing [150,SP] SPECIAL. Reduce the user's AP by 20 for each Pokémon hit.
ability_description.ICE_HAMMER: Deal [50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target, applying FREEZE for 3 seconds. The user is inflicted with PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.POLLEN_PUFF: Give the lowest HP allied Pokémon a pollen puff that heals them for [30,60,120,SP] HP.
ability_description.PSYSTRIKE: Materialize a strange psychic wave toward the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL to them and teleporting all Pokémon in its path.
ability_description.FACADE: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL, doubled if the user suffers from a negative status condition.
ability_description.DREAM_EATER: Jump next to an enemy suffering from SLEEP, deal [45,90,150,SP] SPECIAL and heal for the same amount of HP. If no enemy Pokémon suffer from SLEEP, put the target to SLEEP for [3,4,5,SP] seconds and regain all PP.
ability_description.SPARK: Fire a spark charged with electricity at the target, dealing [40,80,SP] SPECIAL. The spark can bounce up to 4 times between ADJACENT enemy Pokémon. Each rebound halves the SPECIAL.
ability_description.CRUNCH: Deal [40,80,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target. If it knocks out the target, heal for 50% of the target's max HP.
ability_description.CROSS_POISON: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and enemy Pokémon ADJACENT to them and inflict them with POISONNED for 2 seconds.
ability_description.DOUBLE_EDGE: Deal [55,110,220,SP] PHYSICAL to target. The user hurts itself for [20,40,60,SP] PHYSICAL.
ability_description.FIRE_FANG: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and apply BURN for 2 seconds.
ability_description.ICE_FANG: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and apply FREEZE for [1,1.5,2,ND=1] seconds.
ability_description.THUNDER_FANG: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and inflict PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.PSYSHIELD_BASH: Dash to the farthest reachable enemy Pokémon, dealing [30,40,50,60,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the path and PROTECT the user for 1 second.
ability_description.QUIVER_DANCE: Gain [5,SP] ATK, [5,SP] SPE_DEF, [10,SP] SPEED and 20 AP.
ability_description.TORCH_SONG: Blow out [4,SP] raging flames to random opponents. Each flame deals 50% of ATK as SPECIAL, with [30,LK]% chance to BURN for 2 seconds, and buff the user AP by [1,2,3].
ability_description.POWER_WHIP: Unleash a giant vine toward the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [30,60,SP] SPECIAL to any enemy Pokémon in the path.
ability_description.DARK_HARVEST: Teleport into the largest group of enemy Pokémon. Inflict the user with SILENCE for 3 seconds and drain the HP of ADJACENT enemy Pokémon, dealing [5,10,20,SP] SPECIAL per second and heal for 30% of the damage dealt.
ability_description.PSYSHOCK: Burn [20,40,80,SP] PP from the target and gain SHIELD for the same amount. Excess damage is dealt as SPECIAL.
ability_description.HEAVY_SLAM: Slam the ground, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT opponents and gain [15,30,60] SHIELD. The more max HP the user has than the target, the greater the ability's power.
ability_description.RAPID_SPIN: Deal [20,50,SP] SPECIAL and gain [50,SP]% of ATK as DEF and SPE_DEF
ability_description.BOUNCE: Bounce [1,2,3] times to the farthest enemy Pokémon, dealing [10,20,30,SP] SPECIAL to all ADJACENT enemy Pokémon each time.
ability_description.BLOOD_MOON: Ursaluna concentrates all their energy into the blood-red moon on their forehead and projects it in a line, dealing [200,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL and applying WOUND for 3 seconds to all enemy Pokémon hit.
ability_description.TEA_TIME: Heal all allied Pokémon for [15,30,60,SP] HP. All Pokémon holding a berry eat it immediately.
ability_description.SPIKES: Throw up to [6, SP] metal spikes within a 3 tiles range CONE, dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to any enemy Pokémon in the area. The spikes remain on the battlefield, dealing 10 TRUE per second and and inflicting ARMOR_BREAK onto non FLYING or STEEL Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.SHADOW_PUNCH: Fly towards the target with the lowest HP. The next attack deals additional [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.GUNK_SHOT: Deal [50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict POISONNED for [2,4,SP] seconds.
ability_description.MAGNET_BOMB: Launch a magnetic bomb dealing [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to target, [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemy Pokémon and attracting distant enemy Pokémon. All enemies affected are LOCKED for 1.5 second.
ability_description.MUDDY_WATER: Spurt muddy water at up to 3 enemy Pokémon in front of the user, dealing [40,80,SP] SPECIAL and applying WOUND and ARMOR_BREAK for 4 seconds.
ability_description.ANCIENT_POWER: Launch rocks at the target, dealing [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL. Raise the user's AP by 25.
ability_description.MOON_DREAM: Put the target to SLEEP for [3,6,9] seconds and grant [10,20,30,SP] SHIELD to the 3 allied Pokémon closest to the target.
ability_description.STONE_AXE: Deal [50,SP] TRUE to the target and lay sharp stones around them. The stones stay on the battlefield, dealing 10 PHYSICAL per second and applying WOUND to any non ROCK Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.FLASH: Opponents within a 3-tiles radius are BLINDED for [2,4,6,SP,ND=1] seconds.
ability_description.CRUSH_CLAW: Reduce the target's DEF by [5,10] then perform two quick attacks, each dealing [100,SP]% of ATK as PHYSICAL.
ability_description.FIRE_LASH: Deal [120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and apply ARMOR_BREAK for 4 seconds.
ability_description.FAIRY_LOCK: Spread [90,SP] SPECIAL evenly across the target and ADJACENT enemy Pokémon. The target is LOCKED for 5 seconds.
ability_description.DRAIN_PUNCH: Deal [200,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL and heal for 200% of the damage dealt.
ability_description.GRAVITY: All enemy Pokémon are LOCKED for [2,SP] seconds.
ability_description.FAKE_OUT: Deal [40,80,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target and reduce the user's AP by 30. Inflict the target with FLINCH for 3 seconds unless the user's AP was negative.
ability_description.FELL_STINGER: Deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. If it knocks out the target, permanently gain 1 ATK and 10 HP.
ability_description.GULP_MISSILE: Shoot an $t(pkm.ARROKUDA) with full PP at the target, dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL to the target. There is a [20,LK]% chance a $t(pkm.PIKACHU) will be fired instead.
ability_description.SCHOOLING: Deal [10,SP]% of the user's max HP as SPECIAL to the target and ADJACENT enemy Pokémon. If a Wishiwashi is on the bench, it joins the school and gives 50 permanent max HP to the user.
ability_description.DOUBLE_SHOCK: Emit a powerful electric shock, dealing [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict the user with PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.PURIFY: Cure negative status conditions and heal the user for [15,30,60,SP] HP.
ability_description.CHARM: Inflict the target with CHARM for 3 seconds and reduce their ATK by [2,3,4,SP] (min 1).
ability_description.ENTRAINMENT: Dance to a strange rhythm, restoring [10,SP] PP and forcing the target to imitate them, which replaces their ability with Entrainment. If target is already entrained, pick another enemy Pokémon nearby.
ability_description.OCTAZOOKA: Shoot a projectile that deals [300,SP]% of the user's ATK as SPECIAL and leave an ink cloud that makes the target BLINDED for 4 seconds.
ability_description.PSYCHO_SHIFT: Shift the position of the target and the farthest enemy, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL to each.
ability_description.GLAIVE_RUSH: Throw the user's entire body into a reckless charge to the enemy backline, dealing [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in its column. Then the user gets ARMOR_BREAK for 6 seconds.
ability_description.FOUL_PLAY: Deal [2,4,6,SP,ND=1] x the target's ATK as SPECIAL to the target.
ability_description.DOUBLE_IRON_BASH: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, striking with its arms twice in a row for [150,SP]% of its ATK as PHYSICAL for each hit. This causes the target to FLINCH for 3 seconds.
ability_description.STONE_EDGE: For [5,8] seconds, inflict the user with SILENCE, gain 2 RANGE, [20,SP] CRIT_CHANCE and apply [100,SP]% of its DEF as PHYSICAL on attacks.
ability_description.ROAR: Blow away the target. If they hit a wall, deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. If they hit another Pokémon, both are dealt SPECIAL.
ability_description.INFESTATION: Deal [10,SP] SPECIAL to the target for each allied BUG Pokémon on the battlefield. Once per combat, move the STRONGEST BUG Pokémon on the allied player's bench to the battlefield.
ability_description.FORCE_PALM: Deal [60,SP] + [10,SP]% of the target's max HP as SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with PARALYSIS for 6 seconds, +[40,SP] SPECIAL and push the target away if they were already suffering from PARALYSIS.
ability_description.THUNDER_CAGE: Trap the target and ADJACENT enemy Pokémon in an electric prison, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting LOCKED and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.HEADBUTT: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and inflict them with FLINCH for 5 seconds. The damage is doubled if the target has a SHIELD.
ability_description.STEEL_WING: Dash to the farthest reachable enemy Pokémon, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL + 2x DEF as SPECIAL and stealing 1 DEF to all enemy Pokémon in the path.
ability_description.YAWN: Gain [10,20,40,SP] SHIELD. Enemy Pokémon targeting the user are inflicted with FATIGUE for 3 seconds and lose 20 AP.
ability_description.FIERY_DANCE: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings dealing [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target and raises their own AP by 30.
ability_description.BIDE: After 3 seconds, deal SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemy Pokémon equal to [200,SP]% of the damage received during this period.
ability_description.SHORE_UP: Heal for [20,25,SP]% HP, +10% if the weather is SANDSTORM.
ability_description.POISON_STING: Inflict the target with [2,3,4] stacks of POISONNED. Every stack over the max immediately deals [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.TRANSE: Comes out of meditation, healing 30% of its max HP and returns to normal form.
ability_description.WOOD_HAMMER: Deal [400,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL to the target and receive recoil damage equal to 25% of the damage done.
ability_description.TRICK_OR_TREAT: The target must give one of its held items to the user. If it has no held item, it is transformed into $t(pkm.MAGIKARP) for [3,SP,ND=1] seconds.
ability_description.FREEZING_GLARE: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in a line, with a [50,LK]% chance to FREEZE for 3 seconds
ability_description.THUNDEROUS_KICK: Target is pushed away. It and all enemies on the path are FLINCH for 4 seconds, lose [10,SP] DEF and take [20,40,60,SP] PHYSICAL.
ability_description.FIERY_WRATH: Deal [30,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon, with [50,LK]% chance to apply FLINCH for 4 seconds.
ability_description.VISE_GRIP: Grip the target with powerful pincers, dealing [30,60,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. For 4 seconds, user gains [100,SP]% of target DEF and SPE_DEF, and both are LOCKED.
ability_description.BURN_UP: BURN itself for 3 seconds to inflict [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.LANDS_WRATH: The ground erupts, dealing 40 + [100,SP]% ATK as SPECIAL to the target and ADJACENT enemies, then lower their DEF and SPE_DEF by [5,SP].
ability_description.THOUSAND_ARROWS: 33 energy arrows rain down on random tiles, dealing [60,SP] SPECIAL each. All enemies hit are LOCKED for 1 second.
ability_description.CORE_ENFORCER: Hits in a Z-shape area around the target, dealing [80,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting SILENCE for 3 seconds.
ability_description.POWER_HUG: Deal [40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target. The target is LOCKED and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds.
ability_description.MORTAL_SPIN: Knock back any Pokémon targeting the user in melee range. Deal [20,30,40,SP] SPECIAL to any enemies hit, and apply POISONNED for 4 seconds
ability_description.METAL_CLAW: Deal [10,20,40,SP] TRUE to the target and raise the user's ATK by [2,4,6].
ability_description.FIRESTARTER: Gains [10,20,40,SP] SPEED and flies to the furthest enemy, dropping embers on the tiles in between. The embers inflict [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and remain on the ground, so any Pokémon that steps on them BURN and take 10 SPECIAL per second if not FLYING or FIRE.
ability_description.BONE_ARMOR: Flies to the weakest enemy inflicting [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL, healing for the damage dealt. If the target is KO'd, recover its bones to make armor, gaining [4,8,12] DEF and SPE_DEF.
ability_description.RAGE: Get RAGE status for 3 seconds and gain [10,SP]% base ATK for each 10% of max HP missing
ability_description.BRICK_BREAK: Deal [150,SP]% of ATK as TRUE. Breaks target's PROTECT and Magic Bounce.
ability_description.TAUNT: Gain [25,SP=0.5]% of max HP as SHIELD, and force enemies within a 2-tile radius to choose you as target
ability_description.BULK_UP: Increase base ATK and base DEF by [50,SP]%
ability_description.CUT: Deal [40,SP]% of target max HP as SPECIAL. Inflicts WOUND for 5 seconds.
ability_description.FLY: Rise in the air and fall on the farthest target after 1 second, dealing [400,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL.
ability_description.SURF: A wave pushes the user and enemies in the path into the enemy backline. All enemies hit take [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.STRENGTH: Deal 2x(ATK + DEF + SPE_DEF) + AP as SPECIAL
ability_description.TOPSY_TURVY: Deal [40,80,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target. All its ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF buffs become debuffs and vice versa.
ability_description.COLUMN_CRUSH: Builds a pillar on the nearest empty spot. If a pillar is already on the board, jumps to it and throw it at the closest target, dealing [50,100,150,SP] + the remaining HP of the pillar as SPECIAL.
ability_description.WONDER_ROOM: Creates a bizarre area around the target in which enemies DEF and SPE_DEF are swapped for 5 seconds and attacks received are SPECIAL that scale with attacker AP.
ability_description.DARK_LARIAT: Swings arms and hits the target several times while moving behind them. Each hit deals [100,SP]% ATK as SPECIAL. Number of hits increase with SPEED. Target is FLINCH during the attack.
ability_description.BOLT_BEAK: Deal [80,SP] SPECIAL, [160,SP] SPECIAL if the target has more than 40 PP.
ability_description.FREEZE_DRY: Deals [70,SP] + 100% of the user's SPE_DEF as SPECIAL to the target. If target is KO, it explodes, and throws sharp ice at ADJACENT enemies dealing [30,SP] + 50% of the user's SPE_DEF as SPECIAL.
ability_description.DRAGON_PULSE: A shockwave from the user's gaping mouth deals [20,SP] SPECIAL to the target and ADJACENT enemies. The shockwave then reverberates through the enemies.
ability_description.FROST_BREATH: Blows a cold breath, dealing [35,70,140,SP] SPECIAL to enemies in a 2-tiles range CONE, with [50,LK]% chance to FREEZE for 2 seconds. Can crit by default.
ability_description.SALT_CURE: ADJACENT allies gain [10,20,40,SP] SHIELD and their status afflictions cured. Adjacent WATER, STEEL or GHOST enemies suffer from BURN for 5 seconds.
ability_description.SPICY_EXTRACT: Make the [1,2,3] closest allies RAGE for [2,SP] seconds
ability_description.SWEET_SCENT: Enemies in a 3-range radius can no longer dodge attacks, lose [6,SP] SPE_DEF and [12,SP] SPEED and have [30,LK]% chance to be CHARM for 1 second
ability_description.SWALLOW: Store power and boosts its DEF and SPE_DEF by 3 up to 3 times. If below 25% HP, swallow instead, restoring [20,SP]% of max HP per stack. If over 3 stacks, spit up, dealing [40,80,150,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in front.
ability_description.DECORATE: Decorates the nearest STRONGEST ally, increasing its ATK by [1,2,3,SP] and AP by [10,20,30,SP]
ability_description.DRAGON_CLAW: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the lowest health ADJACENT enemy and WOUND them for 4 seconds.
ability_description.TAILWIND: Increase the SPEED of all allies by [5,10,15,SP]
ability_description.HORN_ATTACK: Deal [3,4,5,SP] x ATK as SPECIAL to the target and cause ARMOR_BREAK for 8 seconds.
ability_description.RAZOR_LEAF: Throw sharp leaves in a line behind the target. All enemies hit take [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. Can crit by default.
ability_description.MUD_SHOT: Hurls mud at the target, dealing [25,50,75,SP] SPECIAL and reducing their SPEED by [10,20,30,SP].
ability_description.MALIGNANT_CHAIN: Extends a poisonous chain to ensnare target, inflicting POSSESSED and 3 stacks of POISONNED for [3,SP] seconds.
ability_description.FILLET_AWAY: Sacrifice 30% of current max HP to flee away, gaining [10,SP] ATK, [20,SP] SPEED and PROTECT for a very short time.
ability_description.ELECTRO_SHOT: Gathers electricity for 2 seconds, then gains 40 AP and fires a high voltage shot in a straight line, dealing [80,100,120,SP]. The shot will be fired immediately under STORM
ability_description.FLOWER_TRICK: Throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target that explodes after 3 seconds, dealing [15,40,85,SP] SPECIAL to the target and ADJACENT enemies. Every critical hit received by the target during the duration adds [15,SP] SPECIAL to the explosion.
ability_description.SOLAR_BLADE: Gathers light and fills a blade with its energy for 2 seconds (or instantly if the user is in the LIGHT spot), then slices up to 3 Pokémon in a CONE, dealing [30,60,120,SP] TRUE.
ability_description.SCALE_SHOT: The user sheds their scales, dealing [40,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemies, applying ARMOR_BREAK to itself and enemies hit for 2 seconds. After 2 seconds the scales are shot towards the farthest enemy, dealing [20,SP] SPECIAL to them and [10,SP] SPECIAL to enemies in their path.
ability_description.BULLDOZE: Stomps down on the ground dealing [25,45,85,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemies. Pokémon hit are knocked back and lose 10 SPEED.
ability_description.ARMOR_CANNON: Shoots out a blazing projectile, dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL to the target before bouncing to the 2 closest enemies, dealing [30,SP] SPECIAL to each. The projectiles then return to the original target, dealing an extra [15,SP] SPECIAL each.
ability_description.BITTER_BLADE: Focuses its bitter feelings into a slashing attack, dealing [70,SP] SPECIAL to every ADJACENT enemy. User heals 10% of its max HP for each enemy hit.
ability_description.SUCTION_HEAL: Drains the energy from its targets, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL in a 2 tiles range CONE and heals HP for 50% of the damage dealt.
ability_description.ROOST: Flies away and lands in the back line, SLEEP for 1 second and heals for [20,40,80,SP] HP.
ability_description.BEHEMOTH_BLADE: Dash behind the target and deliver a powerful slash, dealing [100,SP] + 1x ATK as SPECIAL
ability_description.HEAT_CRASH: Crashes into the target, knocking it back and dealing [40,60,80,SP] SPECIAL. Does more damage the more ATK the user has compared to the target.
ability_description.LASER_BLADE:
Alternates between:
1. Spins laser blade around, moving behind their target, gaining [25,SP] SHIELD and dealing [25,SP] SPECIAL to target and ADJACENT enemies on the path.
2. Spins laser blade in front of them, dealing 2 times [25,SP] + ATK as SPECIAL.
ability_description.ICICLE_MISSILE: Launches [1,2,3] icicle missiles on enemies in the backline, dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting FREEZE for 3 seconds.
ability_description.ARM_THRUST: Attacks [2,LK] to [5,LK] times, dealing [100,SP]% of ATK as PHYSICAL each time. Each hit may crit independently by default based on CRIT_CHANCE.
ability_description.DRUM_BEATING:
Cycles through:
1. Wood block: give [10,20,40,SP] SHIELD to the entire team
2. Drum roll: deal [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies
3. Raise the tempo: give [10,20,40,SP] SPEED to the entire team
ability_description.PSYCHO_CUT: Three psychic blades cut and pierce enemies in a line behind the target, each dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies hit. Can crit by default.
ability_description.WICKED_BLOW: Deal [60,SP] TRUE to the target. Always deal a critical hit.
ability_description.SURGING_STRIKES: Strikes the target with a flowing motion 3 times in a row, dealing [100,SP]% of ATK each as SPECIAL. Always deal critical hits.
ability_description.VICTORY_DANCE: Performs a dance to usher in victory. Raise user's ATK and DEF by [3,SP] and SPEED by [10,SP].
ability_description.BOOMBURST: Deal [60,SP] SPECIAL to all ADJACENT units including allies, and causing FLINCH for 4 seconds.
ability_description.FOLLOW_ME: Jump to a free tile far away and gain [40,SP] SHIELD. Enemies that were targeting the user get CHARM for 3 seconds.
ability_description.AFTER_YOU: Gives [15,SP] PP and [10,SP] SPEED buff to the STRONGEST closest ally.
ability_description.COTTON_SPORE: Create a cloud of cotton spores that reduce the SPEED of the 3 closest enemies by [10,20,30,SP]. The cotton remains on the battlefield, causing SLEEP for 1 second to any Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.COTTON_GUARD: Wraps its body in soft cotton, gaining [15,30,60,SP] SHIELD and 3 DEF, then dropping cotton balls in the 3 tiles in front. Cotton balls stay on the ground, inflicting SLEEP for 1 second on any Pokémon that walk on it.
ability_description.TWIN_BEAM: Fires out two beams that hit the furthest enemies, dealing [30,60,100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in a line.
ability_description.SWAGGER: Inflict the target with RAGE and CONFUSION for [3,SP] seconds.
ability_description.ENCORE: Casts the last ability used by an ally
ability_description.STORED_POWER: Deal 20 SPECIAL to the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage. (ATK, SPEED, DEF, SPE_DEF, AP)
ability_description.MIND_BEND: Target is POSSESSED for [2,SP,ND=1] seconds. If RUNE_PROTECT or already POSSESSED, deals [100,SP] SPECIAL instead.
ability_description.CHAIN_CRAZED: Self inflict POISONNED for 3 seconds and gain [15,SP] ATK, [10,SP] DEF and 20 SPEED
ability_description.STEAMROLLER: Rolls over the enemies to the farthest target, dealing [40,80,150,SP]% of SPEED as SPECIAL to all enemies in the path with [50,LK]% chance to apply FLINCH for 3 seconds.
ability_description.MAGNET_PULL: Attracts a random STEEL Pokémon to the battlefield. Click on it to add it to your bench. AP and LUCK increase your chance to attract rarer Pokémon.
ability_description.SPIN_OUT: Drifts to your backline, dealing [25,50,100,SP]% of user's SPEED as SPECIAL to target, and causing BLINDED for 1 second. Then user lose all the SPEED buffs from acceleration.
ability_description.ULTRA_THRUSTERS: ADJACENT enemies take [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and get BURN for 2 seconds while user quickly moves backward to a safe spot.
ability_description.ELECTRO_BALL: Launches an electric ball that bounces between enemies, inflicting [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL on each. The number and speed of bounces depends on the user's SPEED.
ability_description.HORN_LEECH: Drains the target's energy, dealing [200,SP]% of user ATK as SPECIAL and healing for 50% of the damage dealt. 50% of the overheal is converted to SHIELD.
ability_description.DRILL_RUN: Charges through the target like a drill, dealing [15,30,SP] TRUE and swapping position. If there's another target behind in the same direction, immediately cast the ability again on that target. Can crit by default.
ability_description.ROCK_ARTILLERY: Throws [10,15,25] rocks at random enemies, each landing randomly on their target or an ADJACENT tile, each dealing [20,30,40,SP] SPECIAL.
ability_description.ZING_ZAP: Rolls behind the target, dealing [90,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting FLINCH for 3 seconds. If the target suffers from PARALYSIS, gain [40,SP] SHIELD.
ability_description.NO_RETREAT: Gain 1 ATK, 1 DEF, 1 SPE_DEF and 5 SPEED per Falinks on your team. Troopers tackle target for [20,SP] SPECIAL each.
ability_description.STATIC_SHOCK: Deals [70,SP] SPECIAL to the target and gains [30,SP] SHIELD per ADJACENT ELECTRIC Pokémon, heals [30,SP] HP per ADJACENT FAIRY Pokémon.
ability_description.SAND_SPIT: Spits sand at the 3 enemy Pokémon in front of the user, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting BLINDED for 2 seconds.
ability_description.HYPER_DRILL: Deals [10,30,50,SP] TRUE that can break PROTECT, and dig deeper into the ground under the target, destroying any eventual buried items in the process. Double damage if target is already on a fully dug hole.
ability_description.TERRAIN_PULSE:
If user has no field, gets GRASS_FIELD.
Field effects in your team propagate to ADJACENT allies, then trigger an effect:
GRASS_FIELD: heal [5,SP]% of max HP
ELECTRIC_FIELD: gain [10,SP] SPEED
PSYCHIC_FIELD: gain [10,SP] PP
FAIRY_FIELD: gain [5,SP]% of max HP as SHIELD
ability_description.AXE_KICK: Leap to the enemy with the highest PP then deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL and burn [15,SP] PP. Has [30,LK]% chance to inflict CONFUSION for 3 seconds.
ability_description.EXPANDING_FORCE: The user gains PSYCHIC_FIELD, or spreads it to a nearby ally. Then its psychic energy reverbates on all allies in a PSYCHIC_FIELD, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to ADJACENT enemies.
ability_description.SPITE: Drains [20,40,60,SP] PP from target and redistributes [20,40,60,SP] PP to ADJACENT allies
ability_description.GRUDGE: SILENCE the target for 3 seconds, then deals [18,36,52,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies affected by SILENCE
ability_description.JAW_LOCK: Bites the target, inflicting LOCKED for 3 seconds and dealing 125% ATK + [10,15,20,SP] SPECIAL. If target is already bitten, also heals [25,50,100,SP] HP.
ability_description.LAST_RESPECTS: Deals [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL and CURSE that will KO after [10,8,6,SP=-0.2] seconds. If the target has already CURSE, targets another ADJACENT enemy instead.
ability_description.OCTOLOCK: Deals [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL. Inflict LOCKED and ARMOR_BREAK for 3 seconds.
ability_description.BURNING_JEALOUSY: Deals [30,50,70,SP] SPECIAL to the target and ADJACENT enemies. Enemies with ATK buffs lose them and suffer BURN for 5 seconds.
ability_description.FIRST_IMPRESSION: The pokémon, sensing danger, deals [45,90,SP] SPECIAL and inflicts FLINCH for [3,5,SP] seconds before flying away, leaving a random 1 STAR common or uncommon BUG spawn behind.
ability_description.GRUDGE_DIVE: The user takes 10% of its Max HP as SPECIAL and deals [30,60,90,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target + [5,10,15,20,SP] additional SPECIAL per fallen ally.
ability_description.BARED_FANGS: Bites the target dealing [160,SP] % of his ATK as SPECIAL and stealing [10,SP] of the target's SPEED

effect_description.INGRAIN: Restore 5 HP every 2 seconds. Get a berry tree.
effect_description.GROWTH: Restore 15 HP every 2 seconds. Get another berry tree.
effect_description.SPORE: Restore 30 HP every 2 seconds. Get a third berry tree.
effect_description.BLAZE: Attacks have [30,LK]% chance to inflict BURN for 3 seconds
effect_description.DESOLATE_LAND: +3 ATK after every hit. After every round, get a FIRE_SHARD (max 1)
effect_description.RAIN_DANCE: +4 PP per second. Get an Old Rod.
effect_description.DRIZZLE: +8 PP per second. Get a Good Rod.
effect_description.PRIMORDIAL_SEA: +12 PP per second. Get a Super Rod.
effect_description.RISING_VOLTAGE: Every fourth attack is a triple attack
effect_description.OVERDRIVE: Every third attack is a triple attack
effect_description.POWER_SURGE: Triple attacks also deal 10 SPECIAL to target and enemies ADJACENT to it
effect_description.JUSTIFIED: Blocks 12 damage. Throws the target after 8 hits blocked.
effect_description.LIGHT_SCREEN: +100 AP. A Unown appears every 3 shops.
effect_description.EERIE_SPELL: +150 AP. After a fight, get an Unown shop.
effect_description.TILLER: Gain from +1 to +5 DEF and SPE_DEF and +3 ATK at max depth
effect_description.DIGGER: Gain from +2 to +10 DEF and SPE_DEF and +5 ATK at max depth
effect_description.DRILLER: Gain from +3 to +15 DEF and SPE_DEF and +8 ATK at max depth
effect_description.DEEP_MINER: Gain 5 extra DEF and SPE_DEF for each fully dug row and +5 ATK when your half of the board is fully dug
effect_description.VENOMOUS: [60,LK]% chance to POISONNED. Max stacks of POISONNED +1
effect_description.TOXIC: [100,LK]% chance to POISONNED. Max stacks of POISONNED +2
effect_description.DRAGON_ENERGY: Dragon's second synergy counts double (not the third)
effect_description.DRAGON_SCALES: Dragons gain 5 SHIELD for each STAR of all your DRAGON units on board
effect_description.DRAGON_DANCE: Dragons gain 1 SPEED and 1 AP for each STAR of all your DRAGON units on board
effect_description.PURSUIT: [30,LK]% chance to FLINCH. When knocking out a target, gain 3 ATK, 10 AP and 20% of its max HP.
effect_description.BRUTAL_SWING: When knocking out a target, gain 6 ATK, 20 AP and 40% of its max HP
effect_description.POWER_TRIP: When knocking out a target, gain 10 ATK, 30 AP and 60% of its max HP
effect_description.MERCILESS: MONSTER always target the lowest health unit and can target allies with less than 10% of their max HP
effect_description.MEDITATE: Heal for 25% HP of the damage. Get a random TM.
effect_description.FOCUS_ENERGY: Heal for 40% HP of the damage. Get a random TM.
effect_description.CALM_MIND: Heal for 60% HP of the damage. Get a random HM.
effect_description.SWIFT_SWIM: -30% negative status duration. Wave heals 10% max HP and deal 5% max HP as TRUE.
effect_description.HYDRATION: -50% negative status duration. Wave heals 20% max HP and deal 10% max HP as TRUE.
effect_description.WATER_VEIL: -70% negative status duration. Wave heals 30% max HP and deal 15% max HP as TRUE. A second wave hits after 16 seconds.
effect_description.SURGE_SURFER: Waves hit every 8 seconds for the rest of combat. After the first wave, a Surfing Pikachu joins you in battle.
effect_description.FEATHER_DANCE: Get PROTECT for 2 seconds after flying away
effect_description.MAX_AIRSTREAM: Fly away twice when under 50% HP and 20% HP
effect_description.SKYDIVE: Now perform skydive attacks, dealing 150% PHYSICAL ATK on landing on their target
effect_description.FLOWER_POWER: Get an Oddish Flower Pot. If all your pots are fully grown, get a Bellossom Flower Pot and receive AMAZE_MULCH instead.
effect_description.BATTLE_ARMOR: Gain 10 DEF, receive -30% critical damage. Collect one weather rock when the weather changes.
effect_description.MOUTAIN_RESISTANCE: Gain 30 DEF, receive -50% critical damage. Collect up to 2 weather rocks.
effect_description.DIAMOND_STORM: Gain 60 DEF, receive -70% critical damage. Collect up to 3 weather rocks.
effect_description.CURSE_OF_VULNERABILITY: The enemy with the highest DEF + SPE_DEF lose 5 of it and is FLINCH
effect_description.CURSE_OF_WEAKNESS: Also, the enemy with the highest ATK lose 25% of it and is PARALYSIS
effect_description.CURSE_OF_TORMENT: Also, the enemy with the highest AP lose 50% of it and is FATIGUE
effect_description.CURSE_OF_FATE: Also, the STRONGEST enemy is CURSE and will be KO after 8 seconds
effect_description.AROMATIC_MIST: 20% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.FAIRY_WIND: 40% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.STRANGE_STEAM: 60% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.MOON_FORCE: 80% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks
effect_description.SHEER_COLD: +60 SPE_DEF, frozen enemies take 30% additional damage
effect_description.ANCIENT_POWER: Gain 40% base max HP as SHIELD and +40% base ATK
effect_description.ELDER_POWER: Gain 70% base max HP as SHIELD and +70% base ATK
effect_description.FORGOTTEN_POWER: Gain 100% base max HP as SHIELD and +100% base ATK
effect_description.ALLEGRO: Ally team gains +1 ATK and +5 SPEED
effect_description.PRESTO: Ally team gains +1 ATK, +5 SPEED and 3 PP
effect_description.DUBIOUS_DISC: Get an artificial item. It is removed when losing the synergy.
effect_description.LINK_CABLE: Gain +5% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item. Get another artificial item.
effect_description.GOOGLE_SPECS: Gain +10% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item. Get another artificial item.
effect_description.HATCHER: Each BABY has a [10,LK]% chance to find an EGG_FOR_SELL.
effect_description.BREEDER: Get at least one EGG_FOR_SELL after each defeat against a player. Eggs hatch 1 stage earlier.
effect_description.GOLDEN_EGGS: Each BABY has a [5,LK]% chance to find a Golden Egg (max 1 on bench). Golden eggs can be sold for 10 GOLD or give a shiny item when hatched.
effect_description.ETERNAL_LIGHT: Also increase DEF and SPE_DEF by 50% and give RUNE_PROTECT for 8 seconds
effect_description.QUICK_FEET: +30 SPEED. [25,LK]% chance to inflict WOUND for 3 seconds.
effect_description.BERSERK: +40% ATK and +50 SPEED. RAGE 5 seconds sooner
effect_description.FLUID: Ally team gains 1 SPEED and 3 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.SHAPELESS: Ally team gains 3 SPEED and 6 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.ETHEREAL: Ally team gains 6 SPEED and 12 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.APPETIZER: Gain a CHEF_HAT. Cook a Signature Dish after every round and feed the STRONGEST ADJACENT ally.
effect_description.LUNCH_BREAK: The Chef cook two dishes and feed the two STRONGEST ADJACENT allies after every round.

item_description.FOSSIL_STONE: A fossil of a Pokémon that lived in prehistoric times
item_description.OLD_AMBER: The holder gains the FOSSIL type
item_description.DAWN_STONE: The holder gains the PSYCHIC type
item_description.WATER_STONE: The holder gains the WATER type
item_description.THUNDER_STONE: The holder gains the ELECTRIC type
item_description.FIRE_STONE: The holder gains the FIRE type
item_description.MOON_STONE: The holder gains the FAIRY type
item_description.DUSK_STONE: The holder gains the DARK type
item_description.LEAF_STONE: The holder gains the GRASS type
item_description.ICE_STONE: The holder gains the ICE type
item_description.SOUL_DEW: During combat, the holder gains 5 AP and 5 PP every second
item_description.REAPER_CLOTH: The holder's ability can now critically strike based on CRIT_CHANCE. If the ability can already critically strike by default, increase CRIT_POWER by 50% instead.
item_description.POKEMONOMICON: When the holder deals SPECIAL, they BURN the target for 3 seconds
item_description.POWER_LENS: The amount of SPECIAL blocked by SPE_DEF is inflicted back to the attacker
item_description.SHELL_BELL: Holder heals for 33% of all damages inflicted
item_description.AQUA_EGG: The holder regains 20% of its max PP after casting its ability, + 2 PP for each cast done in the fight
item_description.BLUE_ORB: Every 4 attacks, unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to the 2 closest enemies, dealing 10 SPECIAL and burning 20 PP
item_description.SCOPE_LENS: Critical attacks steal 10 PP from the target.
item_description.STAR_DUST: After casting ability, gain 50% of max PP as SHIELD
item_description.GREEN_ORB: Holder and ADJACENT allies regain 3% of their max HP every second. 30% of excess healing is converted to PP.
item_description.DEEP_SEA_TOOTH: The holder attacks restore 5 additional PP. If the attack knocks out the target, restore 15 additional PP.
item_description.SMOKE_BALL: Once below 40% max HP, drop the smoke ball, gain 50 SHIELD and jump to a tile away. Every ADJACENT enemy is PARALYSIS and BLINDED for 4 seconds.
item_description.XRAY_VISION: +50 SPEED. The holder attacks can no longer miss.
item_description.RAZOR_FANG: +100% CRIT_POWER. Critical attacks apply ARMOR_BREAK for 2 seconds.
item_description.PROTECTIVE_PADS: Attacks deal double damage against SHIELD. User is protected from recoil damage and retaliation effects.
item_description.CHOICE_SCARF: Attacks also hit the lowest health enemy ADJACENT to target for 50% of the attack damage, which can trigger on-hit effects.
item_description.PUNCHING_GLOVE: Attacks deal 8 % of target max HP as additional PHYSICAL on hit
item_description.MUSCLE_BAND: When the holder takes damage, gain 1 stack. Every 2 stacks, the holder gains +2 DEF, +1 ATK and +5 SPEED (max 20 stacks)
item_description.WONDER_BOX: At the beginning of each battle, WONDER_BOX is replaced by 2 temporary items (max 3 items held)
item_description.ABILITY_SHIELD: When combat begins, the holder and allies ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW receive 20% of their max HP as SHIELD and RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
item_description.STICKY_BARB: When struck by an attack at melee range, deal 3 + 15% of DEF as retaliation TRUE to the attacker, with [30,LK]% chance to inflict WOUND for 3 seconds.
item_description.FLUFFY_TAIL: Holder is immune to all negative status effects
item_description.KINGS_ROCK: +100 SHIELD + 35% HP as SHIELD when combat begins
item_description.SHINY_CHARM: Prevents damage and give PROTECT for 1.5 seconds and 50 PP the first time the holder gets below 30% HP
item_description.GRACIDEA_FLOWER: When combat begins, the holder and allies ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW gain +20 SPEED
item_description.FLAME_ORB: Holder suffers from BURN during the entire fight but increase its base ATK by 100%
item_description.ASSAULT_VEST: +40 SPE_DEF. Reduce BURN and POISONNED damage by 50%
item_description.POKE_DOLL: Reduce all incoming PHYSICAL and SPECIAL by 30%
item_description.RED_ORB: 25% of attack damage is dealt as TRUE
item_description.MAX_REVIVE: Give RESURECTION, preventing the holder first KO and restoring to max HP
item_description.ROCKY_HELMET: +25 DEF. Negates critical bonus damage from all incoming critical hits.
item_description.AGUAV_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, restore 50% HP and get CONFUSION for 3 seconds
item_description.APICOT_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 20 SPE_DEF
item_description.ASPEAR_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being FREEZE, heal 50 HP and give +15 SPEED and immunity to FREEZE for the rest of the fight
item_description.BABIRI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after receiving a critical hit, heal 50 HP and gain PROTECT for 2 seconds
item_description.CHERI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being PARALYSIS, heal 50 HP and give +10 ATK and immunity to PARALYSIS for the rest of the fight
item_description.CHESTO_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being SLEEP, heal 50 HP and give +50 AP and immunity to SLEEP for the rest of the fight
item_description.GANLON_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 20 DEF
item_description.JABOCA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and cast $t(ability.SPIKY_SHIELD) for 10 seconds
item_description.LANSAT_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 50% CRIT_CHANCE
item_description.LEPPA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after casting ability, heal 50 HP and gain 50 PP
item_description.LIECHI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 15 ATK
item_description.LUM_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP, clear negative status and get RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
item_description.ORAN_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 80 SHIELD
item_description.PECHA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being POISONNED, heal 100 HP and give immunity to POISONNED for the rest of the fight
item_description.PERSIM_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being CONFUSION, heal 50 HP and give 10 SPE_DEF and immunity to CONFUSION for the rest of the fight
item_description.PETAYA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 80 AP
item_description.RAWST_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being BURN, heal 50 HP and give 10 DEF and immunity to BURN for the rest of the fight
item_description.ROWAP_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and cast $t(ability.MAGIC_BOUNCE) for 10 seconds
item_description.SALAC_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 50 HP and gain 50 SPEED
item_description.SITRUS_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 100 HP and increase all healing received by 30%
item_description.COMFEY: Wears $t(pkm.COMFEY) and get its ability and all its base stats
item_description.ELECTIRIZER: Every third attack burns 15 PP of the target and inflicts PARALYSIS for 2 seconds.
item_description.MAGMARIZER: Every successful attack increase ATK by 1 and inflicts BURN for 2 seconds.
item_description.TOXIC_ORB: Gives POISON synergy. Holder suffers from POISONNED but increase its ATK by 100%.
item_description.METRONOME: Gives SOUND synergy. Every second, the holder gains 5 PP.
item_description.AIR_BALLOON: Gives FLYING synergy. Gain 10% chance to dodge attacks and immunity to board effects.
item_description.EXPLORER_KIT: Gives GROUND synergy. Increase the [LK] chance to find gold buried in the ground.
item_description.INCENSE: Each Pokémon in shop has an additional 5% chance to share a common synergy with the holder.
item_description.EXP_SHARE: Get the best ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF values of allies ADJACENT_IN_THE_SAME_ROW.
item_description.POKERUS_VIAL: Infects the holder with POKERUS, gaining 1 ATK and 10 AP every 2.5 seconds and transmitting to allies.
item_description.ROTOM_PHONE: Gives GHOST synergy. After 8 seconds, summons $t(pkm.ROTOM_DRONE) near the holder.
item_description.SILK_SCARF: Gives NORMAL synergy and increase SHIELD from all sources by 50%.
item_description.TINY_MUSHROOM: Gives BUG synergy but reduce the holder's max HP by 50% when cloned.
item_description.BERSERK_GENE: Gives MONSTER synergy. The holder gets CONFUSION for 3 seconds if gaining MONSTER stacks.
item_description.SURFBOARD: Gives AQUATIC synergy. The holder casts $t(ability.SURF) at every tidal wave, with the ability level matching current AQUATIC synergy level.
item_description.COOKING_POT: Gives GOURMET synergy. When BURN, the COOKING_POT is heated little by little which gives 10 SPEED per second.
item_description.MAX_ELIXIR: Restores 100% of max PP 1 second after the first ability cast.
item_description.METEORITE: A meteorite that seems to interact with Deoxys. It continues to give off a faint glow and is slightly warm to the touch.
item_description.MYSTERY_BOX: A mysterious old box. When in your inventory, all $t(pkm.DITTO) found in shops are replaced by $t(pkm.MELTAN).
item_description.TRASH: The remains of an artificial item. No effect. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.OLD_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch common and uncommon WATER Pokémon as well as $t(pkm.MAGIKARP).
item_description.GOOD_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch rare WATER Pokémon as well as $t(pkm.FEEBAS).
item_description.SUPER_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch epic WATER Pokémon as well as $t(pkm.WISHIWASHI).
item_description.DYNAMAX_BAND: At the start of the fight, raise max HP by 200%.
item_description.SHINY_STONE: Gives LIGHT synergy and +1 to LIGHT synergy level. Spawn a second light spot on the holder's tile.
item_description.RARE_CANDY: Immediately make a Pokémon evolve. Can only be given to Pokémon that can evolve, and reduce its sell price to its previous tier.
item_description.EVIOLITE: Holder gets a bunch of stats, but can no longer evolve. Can only be given to non-fully evolved Pokémon.
item_description.WHITE_FLUTE: Spawn 3 WILD Pokémon around the holder at the start of the fight. Rarity and tier increase with stage level.
item_description.GOLD_BOTTLE_CAP: +1% CRIT_POWER per GOLD you have. Gain 1 GOLD per KO. If eliminating the last enemy, get a Jackpot that doubles the amount gained during the round.
item_description.ABSORB_BULB: All the damage reduction is absorbed by the bulb. Once under 50% HP, bulb explodes, dealing all damage absorbed to ADJACENT enemy units as SPECIAL.
item_description.SACRED_ASH: Gives RESURECTION. After resurecting, up to 3 allies KO are resurected as well, but without items.
item_description.COMET_SHARD: Starts the round by diving like a comet on an enemy at the opposite side of the board, dealing 300% ATK as SPECIAL to target and ADJACENT enemies, while gaining PROTECT for 2 seconds.
item_description.REPEAT_BALL: Each time you spend gold on a reroll, gain 1 free reroll. For every 2 shop rerolls, gain 1 SPEED and 2 SHIELD. After lots of rerolls, you may encounter powerful Pokémon in your shop.
item_description.GOLD_BOW: The holder does not count for team size limit.
item_description.DAMP_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards RAIN. Under RAIN, your team gains +2 PP per second.
item_description.ICY_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SNOW. Under SNOW, your team recovers from FREEZE 20% faster and have [5,LK]% additional chance to FREEZE their opponents with their attacks.
item_description.HEAT_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SUN. Under SUN, your team takes 20% less damage from BURN and have [5,LK]% additional chance to BURN their opponents with their attacks.
item_description.SMOOTH_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SANDSTORM. Under SANDSTORM, your team takes 20% less sandstorm damage and gain 1 SPEED every second.
item_description.BLACK_AUGURITE: Counts for 3 towards NIGHT. Under NIGHT, your team gains 5% CRIT_CHANCE and take 10% less critical damage.
item_description.ELECTRIC_QUARTZ: Counts for 3 towards STORM. Under STORM, your team gains 50 SHIELD when struck by lightning and recovers from PARALYSIS 20% faster.
item_description.FLOAT_STONE: Counts for 3 towards WINDY. Under WINDY, your team gains 10 SPEED.
item_description.MIST_STONE: Counts for 3 towards MISTY. Under MISTY, your team gains 3 SPE_DEF.
item_description.BLOOD_STONE: Counts for 3 towards BLOODMOON. Under BLOODMOON, your team gets 30% of incoming healing as SHIELD when WOUND, and heal for 20% of damage dealt if target is WOUND.
item_description.SMELLY_CLAY: Counts for 3 towards SMOG. Under SMOG, your team gains 5% accuracy and has 15% less chance to get POISONNED.
item_description.ODD_KEYSTONE: Counts for 3 towards MURKY. Under MURKY, your team gains 10 LUCK and -10% negative status duration, and resist to CURSE 1 second longer.
item_description.FIRE_SHARD: Sacrifice 3 player HP to give permanently +3 ATK and +3 SPEED to a FIRE Pokémon. Immediately consumed when given.
item_description.TEAL_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the FLORA type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
item_description.WELLSPRING_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the AQUATIC type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
item_description.HEARTHFLAME_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the FIRE type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
item_description.CORNERSTONE_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants Ogerpon the ROCK type during battle. Ogerpon loses its mask when its shield is depleted.
item_description.ZYGARDE_CUBE: Contains cells of the Order Pokémon, Zygarde. It will cause a transformation into one of its alternate formes.
item_description.TM: Teaches a HUMAN Pokémon a new ability and set its max PP to 100. Can only be used once.
item_description.CHEF_HAT: The holder will cook their Signature Dish between rounds. Dropped when benching the unit.
item_description.PICNIC_SET: Immediately consummed when given. Give a SANDWICH to the holder and all ADJACENT allies. SANDWICH gives stat boosts for the next fight based on the types of the Pokémon eating it.
item_description.SANDWICH: Gives various stat boosts for the next fight based on the types of the Pokémon eating it.
item_description.HEARTY_STEW: At the start of next fight, raise max HP by 30%. If fed to a Pokémon holding COOKING_POT, the Pokémon is BURN for 5 seconds.
item_description.RAGE_CANDY_BAR: Gain 10 ATK at the start of the next fight.
item_description.TEA: Gain 80 PP at the start of the next fight.
item_description.CURRY: Start the next fight RAGE for 4 seconds.
item_description.CASTELIACONE: The first attack in the next fight will inflict FREEZE for 5 seconds on hit.
item_description.WHIPPED_DREAM: The first attack in the next fight will inflict CHARM for 5 seconds on hit.
item_description.BERRY_JUICE: Gain 100 SHIELD at the start of the next fight and every time a berry is consumed.
item_description.TART_APPLE: In the next fight, each attack by this Pokémon will remove 2 DEF from the target. Will turn into a SWEET_APPLE after one round.
item_description.SWEET_APPLE: In the next fight, each attack by this Pokémon will remove 2 SPE_DEF from the target. Will turn into a SIRUPY_APPLE after one round.
item_description.SIRUPY_APPLE: In the next fight, each attack by this Pokémon has [30,LK]% chance to inflict PARALYSIS for 1 second. Will turn into LEFTOVERS after one round.
item_description.HERBA_MYSTICA:
Gain a field effect based on its flavor. The flavor will be determined by the type of the Pokémon eating it:
FAIRY: HERBA_MYSTICA_SWEET
GRASS: HERBA_MYSTICA_BITTER
ELECTRIC: HERBA_MYSTICA_SOUR
PSYCHIC: HERBA_MYSTICA_SPICY
Others: HERBA_MYSTICA_SALTY
item_description.HERBA_MYSTICA_BITTER: Get GRASS_FIELD during the next fight
item_description.HERBA_MYSTICA_SALTY: Get RUNE_PROTECT during the next fight
item_description.HERBA_MYSTICA_SWEET: Get FAIRY_FIELD during the next fight
item_description.HERBA_MYSTICA_SPICY: Get PSYCHIC_FIELD during the next fight
item_description.HERBA_MYSTICA_SOUR: Get ELECTRIC_FIELD during the next fight
item_description.OLIVE_OIL: Gain 20% dodge chance in the next fight.
item_description.POFFIN: Gain 100 SHIELD. All held berries are added to the poffin. Their effects are applied immediately, with healed HP turned into SHIELD.
item_description.HONEY: Each Pokémon in the next shop rerolls this round has an additional 5% chance to share a common synergy with a Pokémon eating HONEY.
item_description.ROCK_SALT: Start the next fight with RUNE_PROTECT for 10 seconds and 15% of max HP as SHIELD.
item_description.NUTRITIOUS_EGG: Start the next fight with +30% base ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF.
item_description.LEFTOVERS: No effect. There is not much left to eat.
item_description.BLACK_SLUDGE: POISONNED the Pokémon that eats it. If it has POISON type, restore 5% of max HP every 2 seconds instead.
item_description.BINDING_MOCHI: The first attack in the next fight will cause POSSESSED for 5 seconds on hit.
item_description.FRUIT_JUICE: Gain 50 SPEED in the next fight.
item_description.LEEK: Gain 50% CRIT_CHANCE and allow ability to critically strike in the next fight. If the ability can already critically strike by default, increase CRIT_POWER by 50% instead.
item_description.LARGE_LEEK: Gain 100% CRIT_POWER and allow ability to critically strike in the next fight. If the ability can already critically strike by default, increase CRIT_POWER by 50% instead.
item_description.SPINDA_COCKTAIL: A cocktail with [LK] random effects that can buff stats or make you dizzy.
item_description.SMOKED_FILET: Permanently lose 5 max HP to gain 5 ATK and 10 AP.
item_description.SWEETS: A random candy granting a permanent stats bonus
item_description.VANILLA_FLAVOR: Baked with NORMAL FLYING ARTIFICIAL GOURMET allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_VANILLA). $t(passive_description.VANILLA_CREAM)
item_description.RUBY_FLAVOR: Baked with FIGHTING HUMAN STEEL allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_RUBY). $t(passive_description.RUBY_CREAM)
item_description.MATCHA_FLAVOR: Baked with GRASS FLORA POISON GHOST allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_MATCHA). $t(passive_description.MATCHA_CREAM)
item_description.MINT_FLAVOR: Baked with WATER AQUATIC ICE allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_MINT). $t(passive_description.MINT_CREAM)
item_description.LEMON_FLAVOR: Baked with ELECTRIC BUG FAIRY SOUND allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_LEMON). $t(passive_description.LEMON_CREAM)
item_description.SALTED_FLAVOR: Baked with ROCK GROUND FOSSIL allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_SALTED). $t(passive_description.SALTED_CREAM)
item_description.RUBY_SWIRL_FLAVOR: Baked with FIRE WILD FIELD allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_RUBY_SWIRL). $t(passive_description.RUBY_SWIRL_CREAM)
item_description.CARAMEL_SWIRL_FLAVOR: Baked with DARK MONSTER DRAGON allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_CARAMEL_SWIRL). $t(passive_description.CARAMEL_SWIRL_CREAM)
item_description.RAINBOW_SWIRL_FLAVOR: Baked with PSYCHIC AMORPHOUS BABY LIGHT allies. Use it on $t(pkm.MILCERY) to evolve into a $t(pkm.ALCREMIE_RAINBOW_SWIRL). $t(passive_description.RAINBOW_SWIRL_CREAM)
item_description.EGG_FOR_SELL: An Egg sold at Chansey's Daycare
item_description.AMULET_COIN:
+1 GOLD each time the holder knocks out an opponent.
Reduce max interest cap by 10 GOLD.
item_description.GIMMIGHOUL_COIN:
+3 GOLD when obtained.
Increase max interest cap by 10 GOLD.
item_description.COIN: An old rusty coin. +1 GOLD when obtained.
item_description.NUGGET: A small gold nugget. +3 GOLD when obtained.
item_description.BIG_NUGGET: A big gold nugget. +10 GOLD when obtained.
item_description.EXCHANGE_TICKET: Exchange an item component or a crafted item on bench for another random one. Single use.
item_description.AUSPICIOUS_ARMOR: A peculiar set of armor that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. Auspicious wishes live within it.
item_description.MALICIOUS_ARMOR: A peculiar set of armor that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. Malicious will lurks within it.
item_description.RUSTED_SWORD: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. Gives the holder +50% base ATK. Transfers to the ally with the weakest ATK when the holder faints.
item_description.SCROLL_OF_WATERS: Written upon it are the true secrets of the path of water. When used on a $t(pkm.KUBFU), will cause it to evolve into $t(pkm.URSHIFU_RAPID).
item_description.SCROLL_OF_DARKNESS: Written upon it are the true secrets of the path of darkness. When used on a $t(pkm.KUBFU), will cause it to evolve into $t(pkm.URSHIFU_SINGLE)
item_description.RICH_MULCH: Use it on a flower pot to evolve the Pokémon inside.
item_description.AMAZE_MULCH: Use it on a flower pot to permanently give 50 max HP and 30 AP to the Pokémon inside.

passive_description.TYROGUE:
Will choose a combat discipline based on the first item given:
CHARCOAL MAGNET: $t(pkm.HITMONLEE)
HEART_SCALE NEVER_MELT_ICE: $t(pkm.HITMONCHAN)
Others: $t(pkm.HITMONTOP)
passive_description.PROTEAN2: The Pokémon acquires the typing of the 2 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.PROTEAN3: The Pokémon acquires the typing of the 3 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.CASTFORM: Castform changes its form and the weather to SUN, RAIN or SNOW depending on your dominant synergy between FIRE WATER ICE
passive_description.MANAPHY: When given an AQUA_EGG, $t(pkm.MANAPHY) will spawn $t(pkm.PHIONE) on your board at the start of the fight
passive_description.SCYTHER: $t(pkm.SCYTHER) is looking for a METAL_COAT or a BLACK_AUGURITE
passive_description.PRIMAL: Legend has it that you could unleash the ancient powers of these Pokémon
passive_description.WONDER_GUARD: Blocks 20 damage on every hit received
passive_description.ELECTRIC_TERRAIN: Give ELECTRIC_FIELD to your ELECTRIC Pokémon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.GRASSY_TERRAIN: Give GRASS_FIELD to your GRASS Pokémon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.MISTY_TERRAIN: Give FAIRY_FIELD to your FAIRY Pokémon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.PSYCHIC_TERRAIN: Give PSYCHIC_FIELD to your Psychic Pokémon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.EEVEE: Eevee can evolve into one of the 8 Eeveelutions when given a synergy stone
passive_description.TYPE_NULL: $t(pkm.TYPE_NULL) can evolve into $t(pkm.SILVALLY) when given a synergy item
passive_description.RKS_SYSTEM: RKS system: $t(pkm.SILVALLY) can change its synergy items at any time. Place it on bench to drop synergy items.
passive_description.SUDOWOODO:
Pretends to be a tree and does not attack but gain [2,4] ATK per second instead (stackable).
Starts attacking when PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.WOBBUFFET: Does not move or attack until PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.DITTO: Ditto can transform to create a 1 STAR copy of one of your Pokémon you drop it over (not Unique, Legendary or Hatch)
passive_description.EGG: You can feel something moving inside
passive_description.HATCH: Hatched Pokémon evolve automatically after 5 stages
passive_description.SYNCHRO: If the Pokémon is affected by POISONNED, BURN, WOUND or SILENCE, the enemy caster will suffer the same negative status
passive_description.TADPOLE: Poliwhirl will evolve into Poliwrath if placed on the frontlane, Politoed otherwise
passive_description.BIVALVE: Clamperl will evolve into Huntail if placed on the frontlane, Gorebyss otherwise
passive_description.LUGIA: Lugia changes weather to WINDY and looks for a DUSK_STONE
passive_description.LANDORUS: Change weather to SANDSTORM or WINDY based on your dominant synergy between GROUND and FLYING
passive_description.THUNDURUS: Change weather to STORM or WINDY based on your dominant synergy between ELECTRIC and FLYING
passive_description.TORNADUS: Change weather to WINDY or SNOW based on your dominant synergy between FLYING and ICE
passive_description.ENAMORUS: Change weather to MISTY or WINDY based on your dominant synergy between FAIRY and FLYING
passive_description.SHARED_VISION: Shared Vision: All Pokémon with Shared Vision will attack the same target, if at range
passive_description.WATER_SPRING: Whenever an enemy uses their ability, gain 5 PP
passive_description.GIRATINA: Giratina switches between its Altered Forme and Origin Forme depending on its position on the board
passive_description.MELOETTA: Meloetta switches between its Pirouette Forme and Aria Forme depending on its position on the board
passive_description.UNOWN: Unown cannot hold items and vanish after one fight or after casting their ability
passive_description.GLIGAR: Gligar is looking for a RAZOR_FANG. First stack of POISONNED heals $t(pkm.GLIGAR) instead of taking damage.
passive_description.GLISCOR: First stack of POISONNED heals $t(pkm.GLISCOR) instead of taking damage
passive_description.GRIM_NEIGH: When the Pokémon knocks out an enemy, it emits a terrifying whinny sound that increases its AP by 30
passive_description.SHAYMIN: Shaymin is looking for a GRACIDEA_FLOWER
passive_description.BEAST_BOOST_ATK: Upon inflicting a KO, this Pokémon gains 5 ATK
passive_description.BEAST_BOOST_AP: Upon inflicting a KO, this Pokémon gains 10 AP
passive_description.CHINGLING: Chingling is looking for a STAR_DUST
passive_description.CHIMECHO: Resonates to the sounds of ADJACENT allies, which doubles their cry while Chimecho is alive
passive_description.SURGE_SURFER: The surge surfer gets +30 SPEED in ELECTRIC_FIELD or PSYCHIC_FIELD
passive_description.MEGA_LAUNCHER: This Pokémon ability emits 3 SOUND cries instead of one
passive_description.DRY_SKIN: Heals 8 HP per second under RAIN. Gains 25% dodge chance under SANDSTORM. Gains 50 AP under SUN
passive_description.SPOT_PANDA: This Pokémon is immune to CONFUSION and deals [100,SP]% additional SPECIAL to Pokémon affected by CONFUSION
passive_description.GUTS: The Pokémon gains 5 ATK as long as it is BURN or POISONNED
passive_description.STENCH: Leaves behind a stinking cloud that POISONNED any unit that breathes it
passive_description.MOXIE: Every time an enemy Pokémon is KO, it gains ATK equal to its stars
passive_description.ILLUMISE_VOLBEAT: Illumise and Volbeat gain 5 PP per second for each other member of their species alive on the board
passive_description.PRISM: Necrozma switches between its Ultra form and Normal form depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.BLOSSOM: Cherrim switches between its Sunlight form and Normal form depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.SPECIAL_ATTACK: Basic attacks deal SPECIAL and scale with AP
passive_description.NINCADA: After evolving, get Shedinja as well if you have a free space on your bench
passive_description.FAMILY: The Pokémon grows with time (turn 15 and turn 20)
passive_description.SAND_STREAM: The Pokémon count as 3 for SANDSTORM
passive_description.DRIZZLE: The Pokémon count as 3 for RAIN
passive_description.WIND_POWER: The Pokémon count as 3 for STORM
passive_description.GLUTTON: Permanently gains max HP when eating: 10 HP for each berry, 20 HP for each dish, 30 HP when cooking as a Chef
passive_description.COMFEY: Comfey cannot hold items. At the start of the fight, the STRONGEST nearest ally with a free item slot wears Comfey and gains all its base stats. Comfey casts its ability at the same time as its holder. When its holder is KO, Comfey fights on its own.
passive_description.HISUIAN_TYPHLOSION: The Pokémon inflicts 20% extra damage on a BURN or SILENCE target
passive_description.PICKUP: The Pokémon will start with a random item if it's not holding anything
passive_description.CORSOLA: $t(pkm.CORSOLA) evolves into $t(pkm.GALAR_CORSOLA) after being KO once
passive_description.CELEBI: The player regains 1 HP every time $t(pkm.CELEBI) casts $t(ability.TIME_TRAVEL).
passive_description.GIMMIGHOUL: $t(pkm.GIMMIGHOUL) is looking for 99 GOLD in bank
passive_description.GHOLDENGO: At the start of each fight, if the player has reached max GOLD interests, $t(pkm.GHOLDENGO) gains RUNE_PROTECT for the entire fight
passive_description.METEOR:
$t(pkm.MINIOR) alternates between its meteor and core forms. The meteor form grants [5,SP] SPEED per attack.
 Core form attacks apply additional effects on target and ADJACENT enemies:
 Red: Deals [150,SP]% PHYSICAL
 Blue: Deals [100,SP]% SPECIAL
 Orange: Deals [50,SP]% TRUE
 Green: heals ADJACENT allies for [100,SP]% of damage dealt
